data.title: Abigail Spencer bio: age, height, measurements, net worth, boyfriend
data.meta_description: Why is ABIGAIL SPENCER so famous? The celebrity is renowned for her role as Rebecca Tyree on All My Children. Know more about her career, height, and net worth.
data.text:
Abigail Spencer is a popular actress, producer, and writer from the United States of America. She became prominent after portraying Rebecca Tyree on the television series titled All My Children. The actress is also popularly known for featuring in the television show Timeless as Lucy Preston.

The celebrated actress is further recognized for her numerous significant roles in other television shows such as Mad Men, Angela's Eyes, Rectify, among many others.

Spencer has featured in various films such as This Mean War, Chasing Mavericks, In My Sleep, Cowboys & Aliens, This Is Where I Leave You, among many others.

Profile summary

Birth name: Abigail Leigh Spencer

Date of birth: August 4, 1981

Town of birth: Gulf Breeze, Florida, United States of America

Age: 38 years

Star sign: Leo

Nationality: American

Ethnicity: White

Abigail Spencer height: 5 feet 5 inches

Profession: Actress, writer, producer

Religion: Christianity

Abigail Spencer's early life

She was born in Gulf Breeze, Florida on August 4, 1981. At the moment, Abigail Spencer age is 38 years.

The actress is the daughter to Lydia Ann Brown and Yancy Spencer III. She was raised alongside her two brothers, Yancy Spencer IV and Sterling Spencer.

What are Abigail Spencer measurements?

How tall is Abigail Spencer? Her height is 5 feet 5 inches (165 cm or 1.65m). Her body weight is 53 Kg (117 pounds). Spencer’s body measurements are 34-24-35 inches (chest, waist, and hips, respectively).

Abigail’s hair is dark brown, and she has brown eyes. Her bra size is 32B, and her shoe size is 7.5 (US).

How old is Abigail Spencer? She is 38 years old.

Abigail Spencer movies and TV shows

Spencer’s career in the entertainment industry started with a significant role in the soap opera All My Children as Rebecca Tyree in 1998.

The actress then featured in the Lifetime crime drama series Angela’s Eyes. Unfortunately, the show was cancelled in 2006.

In 2009, the star starred in Mad Men as Miss Farrell. Due to her excellent acting skills, she landed a role as Dr. Erin Jameson in Hawthorne in 2010.

She also played in two Krista Vernoff dramas, Introducing Lennie Rose and Grace. Spencer is also a film writer and a producer.

Over the years, Abigail Spencer has starred in different television series and films. As a result, she has built herself a great name, especially in Hollywood.

Below is a list of somemovies and television shows she has been part of.

Awards and nomination

Spencer's acting career has secured her two awards and three nominations so far. Her wins include:

Soap Opera Digest Awards

In 2000, she won the Outstanding Female Newcomer award for her role is All My Children.

The Film Series at Cine Gear Expo - A Tribute to the Visual Art of Filmmaking

In 2015, she won the Best Independent Short Film award along with other members of the cast for their excellent job in Winter Lights.

Who is Abigail Spencer boyfriend?

The beauty was married to Andrew Pruett from 2004 to 2012. Their union bore a baby boy, Roman Pruett, who was born on September 19, 2008. Unfortunately, in February 2012, the couple divorced.

Since 2012, the All My Children star has been dating Josh Pence. Josh is an American actor.

Where does Abigail Spencer live?

In 2019, it was reported that she was living in North Califonia filming Reprisal.

How much is Abigail Spencer net worth?

Abigail Spencer is enjoying a net worth estimated to be about 3 million dollars.

Social media accounts

The celebrity is active on various social media platforms. Her Twitter account has 113.5k followers. Abigail Spencer Instagram account has 572k followers.

If you would like to see awesome Abigail Spencer hot photos, these are the accounts to follow.

Abigail Spencer is a talented actress from the USA. The actress has featured in many films and television shows, which has contributed to her increased popularity. The celebrity is bound to go far due to her dedication and passion for acting. Her fans cannot wait to see her feature in many series and films in the future.
